concept.title: Using Impala to Query HBase Tables

conbody.p: HBase You can use Impala to query HBase tables. This capability allows convenient access to a storage system that is tuned for different kinds of workloads than the default with Impala. The default Impala tables use data files stored on HDFS, which are ideal for bulk loads and queries using full-table scans. In contrast, HBase can do efficient queries for data organized for OLTP-style workloads, with lookups of individual rows or ranges of values.
